I know after the 1st use my skin felt amazing and you don't need a lot if any moisturizer after, it leaves a silky feeling after and its not drying your skin out!

reviews.review_header: and use a simple clay mask like Queen Helene twice per week
reviews.review_text: Cleans off make-up but that is all. Not nourishing, doesn't take out blackheads. My recommendation, get a peel or facial for troublesome skin and then exfoliate, moisturize, and use a simple clay mask like Queen Helene twice per week.

I have large pores,so I use anything I can get my hands on to smooth my skin out. I've only used it once, but my skin felt smooth and tight (in a good way) afterwards and looked fantastic. I'll order it again. Oh, and I have really sensitive skin and this didn't bother it at all.

reviews.review_header: My favorite mask I've ever used
reviews.review_text: My favorite mask I've ever used. The bubbles fizzing makes it a bit ticklish but it really is effective. Make sure after the bubbles are all foamed up, you rub it in and enjoy your actual clay mask for a good 10-15 minutes. It can be difficult to wash off but I feel like I am just washing away blackheads and excess sebum every time. My favorite mask to use any time-- but I especially love using it before an event. It gives me that extra glow and makes me feel so nice!

reviews.review_header: Good, but leaves a film on face
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift, and it's so much fun to use. As the mask foams up, your face looks like it's growing. The foam creates a tickling sensation on the face, but isn't unpleasant. I left off a 5th star for one reason. As others have mentioned, I notice that the mask leaves a film behind on my face after washing it off. My face will feel tacky to the touch. I have to go back in with a face wash to remove the film. Even when followed by a thorough cleaning with a quality facial wash, the film doesn't always feel like it's gone. I'll continue to use the product until I finish it, but I wish it didn't require an extra step.

For the price this is I expected a good size amount, and it wasn't that big. I used a regular nail polish bottle next to it for comparison. Also as small as the container is, that's not even the amount of product you get ! The first picture I included because you can see that there's like half an inch of just the container and no product? For the price there should be a decent amount you'd think!

reviews.review_header: Ok for fun, but no noticeable skin improvement
reviews.review_text: It’s fun to use, because it definitely does bubble up very satisfyingly, and it didn’t cause me to break out, but neither did it really do anything for my skin. Usually after a good mask, my skin feels very soft and rejuvenated, but with this mask it just feels normal. I’d only use this if I was having a sleepover party with friends and the goal was just to have fun and look silly - if the goal is to actually improve my skin, I’d use something else.

I just tried it with my roomie and we both loved it! It felt a lil funny at first but my skin feels and looks pretty amazing! Glad I tried it, def recommend it! My roomie has super sensitive skin too and it didn't bother her at all to use the mask either so it's a pretty awesome product!

reviews.review_header: Plus it's weird and fun and makes you kinda look like JoJo the Dog ...
reviews.review_text: I totally bought this for the novelty factor, but damn it all if it doesn't WORK. I noticed a difference in my skin after the first time I used it. Plus it's weird and fun and makes you kinda look like JoJo the Dog Faced Boy while it's working - all of which is just a giant bonus. Completely worth it!!

So I haven't exactly used mine yet because I'm scared. In all the photos I've seen and videos I've watched, the mask is a thick, gray consistency and is said to have little smell. Yet when I opened mine it was a slimy green mixture and it smelt like girly shampoo. Not sure why mine is different or if I should even attempt to try it out.

reviews.review_header: ... I used it the first time and fell in love with the bubbling and popping sensation on my face ...
reviews.review_text: Ok so I used it the first time and fell in love with the bubbling and popping sensation on my face and the smoothness of my skin after I washed it off. It seemed amazing at first. So good that I went ahead and ordered 3 more for my mom and I. I went to sleep soon after I finished the first time. Woke up with an oily face. Didn't think of it much as I do have an oily T zone. Then my mom came and told me that she had red rash marks near her nose and cheek area and that her face was super oily. She has normal skin so I was surprised to actually see it greasy. By then I had already ordered them so I gave them away as gifts with some bathroom sets and threw mine away. The next morning I also developed those painful under the skin pimples and my cheeks felt like were burning up. Kept on washing my face with chamomile tea.

reviews.review_header: Fun to use but did make my skin feel a ...
reviews.review_text: 2 stars because it came with the product having seeped out of the container and was all over it. So before I could even use it I had to wash the entire container and scrub the hardened mask product off of it. Fun to use but did make my skin feel a little dry afterwards. Not something I would do on a regular basis.

reviews.review_header: Holy Smokes! Blackheads GONE. I believe
reviews.review_text: So in all honesty, I was very skeptical. Have done bentonite masks for two decades and have never experienced anything like this. did the mask, per directions, scrubbing again midway through. When I went to wash it off, I literally saw black dots all over that WERE my blackheads. GONE. Last facial two years ago, so there was lots to remove. What used to take an estetician digging painfully for half hour for lesser results, took less than 10, with incredible results . Face is tingling. And clean. Wow.

I ordered this off of the actual website rather than Amazon although I definitely recommend buying it through Amazon it's way cheaper. I ordered this mask after watching a video on Facebook and reading multiple reviews. I don't usually get breakouts I was looking for a product that will help get rid of the blackheads along my nose and hoped this would finally be the product to do that. Unfortunately it just didn't work for me. I've been using it for about a month now (every few days) and it does leave my skin feeling very soft but it hasn't done much to improve my skin. It is kind of hard to put on as well because it literally starts bubbling as soon as it touches your skin and then rinsing it off is even worse. Usually I would just take a shower and wash it off in there which made it a little easier. Overall I did like this product but I probably won't buy it again I feel it was the same as a normal face wash.

reviews.review_header: After 2 minutes my skin was on fire! Quickly ...
reviews.review_text: After 2 minutes my skin was on fire! Quickly washed it off and my skin was red for awhile, but it’s softer today and some acne cleared up.

I got this as a birthday gift and it works AMAZING. my skin has never been so clear! i struggle with blackheads but after using this for only a week, there all almost gone! my skin is soft and feels so clean! the only thing i don’t like is when it bubbles up it makes some spots on my face itch lol, but that’s just me. 10/10 would buy again

reviews.review_header: This product does a pretty good job of getting the dirt out of your ...
reviews.review_text: This product does a pretty good job of getting the dirt out of your pores. The mask tickles while you have it on but your skin feels great after you wash it off. I would recommend this product if you are looking for something a little different than the regular, boring face mask.
Super fun to use. The bubbles give your face a feeling of cleaning. My face is so soft after using. The product is hard to get off which is why I only gave it four stars.
I ordered this from a different website but the same product. While it feels really cool from all the tingly bubbles I didn't see a difference in my skin. It didn't feel softer or look brighter.

This mask is amazing! I know I'm repeating what other users have said but it's the truth. It takes very little of this product each use, you want the thinnest layer possible or it will poof up into your nose, eyelashes and everywhere! Even using the thinnest layer imaginable it still poofs quite a lot and is tons of fun, as well as effective. My skin loves this mask, and I will be ordering again when I run out and as gifts. This would make a GREAT starter mask for kiddos. It bubbles, causing tickling, but also a soothing sensation. It would be the talk of any little girl slumber party. More than that it really works. Clears out stubborn gunk, and preps the skin for the rest of your routine. I can use this when my skin is dry or oily to balance.

This product doesn't quit! It keeps bubbling even after rubbing it out 3 times. I've only used it twice so far but I've noticed my skin getting clearer. There's a lot of product despite the size of the container. The only down side is that it's a bit tough to wash off, so make sure you use a sponge or wash it off in the shower

reviews.review_header: This is a very fun face mask
reviews.review_text: This is a very fun face mask! It foams up a bunch but I can also feel it working and leaves my skin tingling and glowing.

reviews.review_header: Your face hasn't felt nothing yet!
reviews.review_text: Amazing!!!! It made my face tickle with delight. I can't wait to use it again in a couple days. Hands down the best ever. Did have to look on amazon to find out how to use that would be my only negative comment.

I saw the video for the carbonating bubble mask and had to buy it. I love the feeling and noticed my skin appeared tighter. My niece spent the night and wanted to do a face mask, since this was the only mask I had on hand we ended up applying the mask and also got my 8 year old son to do it too! It was fun watching their reactions to the bubbles and clay. It was also pretty funny watching them attempt to wash it off, it is somewhat hard to wash off. Thanks!

This mask was great. There’s a little spatula that is included to apply the mask. It starts to foam almost as soon as you apply it to your face. Very bubbly and can be tickle near your nose but it’s so fun, I look forward to using this mask. Leaves your skin feeling soft, and amazing! Love it.

reviews.review_header: like I'm talking 3-4 times a week for the past ...
reviews.review_text: NOPE NOPE NOPE! My skin isn't sensitive to products generally speaking and I have a really clear complextion but this product made my skin FREAK OUT!!! Originally I thought maybe the product was pulling impurities out but my god, I have monster volcano breakouts in the weirdest places, places that never broke out even when I was a teenager. I use clay and charcoal masks on a regular basis, like I'm talking 3-4 times a week for the past 5-6 years; so I know that isn't the cause of my freak breakouts. I will not be using this any longer which sucks because it is a fun mask to play with. Womp womp :(

I use tons of face masks, from drug store brand to glam glow and I have to say this is one of my favorites. It takes a little while to get used to the tickling feeling! Fun to use with friends and great as a gift. It makes my skin feel tight and new with a noticeable tightening of pores after a couple uses. My skin as a brightened glow to it that people have commented on as well. Definitely recommend. Easy on sensitive skin, use it before washing your face. Can sting a little bit if applied to a feshy washed face. Otherwise no pain :)
I like the novelty of the product. It IS fun to use. And it smells nice! I began breaking out as soon as I started using it though :(

It's an amazing pack. Clay bubble pack is great. Apply to your skin and bubble a little after a while. I rub it around my nose with my hand. Blackhead, keratin is removed. After rinsing, the skin is smooth. It is recommended to use it strongly.

reviews.review_header: This mask feels amazing as it bubbles up
reviews.review_text: This mask feels amazing as it bubbles up. My face feels clean but not right after washing it off, and I'm able to get blackheads that otherwise refused to budge. As others mentioned, it's easiest to wash off in the shower, since it's think and takes a while to wash away.

reviews.review_header: I use it several times a week and my skin always looks and feels great! I do have a problem with the bubbles ...
reviews.review_text: This is the ultimate pore clearing mask! I use it several times a week and my skin always looks and feels great! I do have a problem with the bubbles getting in my nose and it's super messy when I'm cleaning it off but it is so worth it!

Let me tell ya, as a red head with crazy sensitive skin I was a lil leery at first...but OMGOODNESS!!! This is an AWESOME product!! I am a Chef and standing in a kitchen all day reeks havoc on my skin...between the steam and the oil, my face is a mess...it left my skin feeling super clean, soft, and dewey looking. I didnt break out or have any issues with sensitivity...I'm HOOKED...I got the Sea Salt Cream as well and it is fabulous too!!! Go Milky Piggy!!!

reviews.review_header: Give it a shot, well worth it...
reviews.review_text: Super fun, did it's job well. Face still stings though after a few hours. Pores are almost non visable. Sensitive skin beware...I have it and it did cause some redness and burning.

To be honest I bought this mask because of the bubbles. I used it once and didn't feel or see any difference so I thought it was another dud. That is until l used a nose strip 3 days after using the mask once. It was full! I always used nose strips and they took out some blackheads but nothing compared to what I took out after I used the mask. I was disgusted and impressed. It even got some where I didn't even think I had them. So it did work for me when I used it in conjunction with a nose strip a couple of days afterwards.

I enjoy this product for the pure look and feel of it, but other than that I do not see a difference when it is used. I do like the feeling of the tingling and popping bubbles and taking snaps as the bubbles swell

Not only is this mask fun, I love how my face feels afterwords! During the bubbling process it tickles my face, but it also tingles a little bit. The smell isn't my favorite but it isn't awful either. Also, when washing the mask off, it helps to scrub your face like you would if you were using face wash, and even then it still takes a minute to get it all washed off. The instructions aren't in English but it isn't hard to look them up and the application is mainly just common sense. Enjoy!

I will be giving this as a gift so I can't review the actual product, but I can review the packaging and shipping speed. The mask comes in a good quality box with the product name and info on it. The shipping was fast and excellent with Prime! Would definitely buy again to try for myself!

reviews.review_header: I was excited and really wanted to like this 'fun' mask
reviews.review_text: I was excited and really wanted to like this 'fun' mask, but like other reviewers pointed out, a few minutes after application, this mask made my face itchy and burned. I've tried this mask twice (hoping the first time was a fluke!) but it really made me break out, both times (three weeks apart.) I usually don't have such bad reactions to skin care products, but this really did a number on my skin.

reviews.review_header: This mask is great. I used it as soon as it arrived ...
reviews.review_text: This mask is great. I used it as soon as it arrived and it left my face very smooth. I let it sit for about 5-7 minutes and then I massaged the bubbles into my face, and rinsed off with lukewarm water. Would definitely recommend this and will definitely buy again.

THIS STUFF IS AWESOME! And fun! You can't help but laugh because it puffs up and you look like a swollen person. Lol works great, feels great after you wash it off too. Leaves your skin refreshed and soft.
Product arrived defective because it leaked all over. I dont thonk the product is sanitary to ise and will be all dried out! Unusable.
Love this mask. It tickles a lot at first and I didn't know how long I would be able to keep it on. Works great though. Face looks and feels great after.

reviews.review_header: This is pretty neat and fun to use
reviews.review_text: This is pretty neat and fun to use! The only thing I struggle with is getting an itch from the bubbles popping and I don't want to scratch the itch because I don't want to mess up the mask lol.

reviews.review_header: This is a fun mask! i use it sparingly
reviews.review_text: This is a fun mask! i use it sparingly, when I feel as though my skin needs a pick-me-up! It does tickle though and is torture when you're waiting for the 5 minutes to be up.

I love this mask!!!! It is the perfect pick-me-up for days when I need some "me" time! The first time I used it I could not stop laughing! It makes my face so soft and smooth, and it provides entertainment!
My daughter ordered this and I reluctantly tried...I'm a believer though...it felt like silky bubbles and smelled like lightly scented upscale hotel soap...my face was SPOILED! GOOD STUFF!!!

eel tingly while it's bubbling up, but once washed off it leaves my skin looking clean and radiant. Did not irritate or cause any redness. I suggest applying before a shower. It's messy when removing. My skin type is sensitive/combination

Honestly, I feel like this product doesn't do a whole lot. It's fun to watch bubble up, and that's about it. The softness and smoothness is just excess product, what's being left behind. Doesn't help in the long run.

Made my face feel very clean. It took a few applications to get the hang of it, if you use too much it expands as the carbonation activates and swallows up your eyes. I didn't find this to magically improve my skin or become a "can't live without" product, but it's fun.

reviews.review_header: After using it a couple times I sh*t you not within 2 week I saw pretty good change in my face
reviews.review_text: I brought about 4 of things awhile back! I was really skeptical about this product because I saw it on facebook. After using it a couple times I sh*t you not within 2 week I saw pretty good change in my face. (That also includes seeing less acne)
I love this stuff! it feels so great when I rub it into my skin - and a little bit goes a LONG way! I am definitely going to be using more of the Milky Piggy products in the future!
This mask is really fun, although I don't see a large difference in my complexion.

reviews.review_header: Feel like a moldy fruit at firstbut then have smooth clean skin after.
reviews.review_text: While feeling like a moldy fruit is a new experience for me I was pleased with the results. My skin felt firm and very clean. I will say it is a mess to get off your face though.

reviews.review_header: Love this! Makes your face feel amazing!!⛤⛤⛤⛤⛤
reviews.review_text: I love this clay bubble mask! It makes your face feel so hydrated afterwards which is what I needed! Thank You! Will be buying more products from Elizavecca Milky piggy!⛤⛤⛤⛤⛤

I love this mask. It definitely was slightly itchy while it was on but it made my skin feel super clean afterwards. It was affordable too. I'm going to look at the brands other products now! Very pleased with the purchase!

I absolutely love this face mask! I use a lot of face masks. (Lush, Glamglo, homemade, etc.) and this one does a good job. I love how it bubbles and smells. But it leaves my skin feeling extremely soft and glowing. I was a little nervous when it came in because the box was in a different language but it's just basic instructions, I personally left mine on for 7 minutes. Just be careful and don't get it too close to your eyes because it does bubble over and it will get in your eyes.

reviews.review_header: I do not recommend for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as birthday gift and it made my entire face red and itchy for about a week. I do not recommend for sensitive skin.
Definitely itchy on your face, but to me that's a sign it's working. Leaves face smooth but not dry.

This is so fun and interesting! The mask smells pleasant and not too strongly. It feels really nice on the skin, it feels like it cleans deeply with all its little bubbles. The more you put on the more bubbles and exfoliation occur. I used it sparingly around my nostrils for fear of it tickling too bad. When the 5 minutes were up I sort of rubbed the product into my face and it continued to bubble even after that! I am very impressed with this mask. My skin fet noticeable smoother and tighter (in a good, firm way) when taken off!

reviews.review_header: Super fun mask leaves skin feeling amazing!
reviews.review_text: I finally got myself one of these and boy am I glad I did! It's so fun to watch the mask fizz up. It has a pleasant smell. A little bit thick to wash away so you'll spend time doing that. My skin felt a little bit right after but it feels so smooth and looks radiant. Please get yourself one, it's really awesome.

It's an amazing and fun mask that makes my face super smooth after even though I don't use that much (probably 1 scoop?) or wait that long before washing off. A lot of blackheads usually gather around the sides of my nose and this clears out a lot of them. It also doesn't irritate my acne and only has a light clay smell so it's not overwhelming.

reviews.review_header: This product brings world piece and makes you fall in love
reviews.review_text: All I can say is wow. It has been my ultimate life dream to become Squidward Tennisballz. The day this product arrived on my front door step is the day I finally lived my life. I am 4 weeks into my transition and I've never been happier. 5 tentacles from me!!

Oh my gosh, I love this!! I received it as a gift and honestly didn't have high expectations other than it being fun. Well, not only was it super fun but it ended up cleaning the heck out of my pores and left my skin soooo smooth!! It's a win win. I just love it.

reviews.review_header: a really great product! Just make sure to rub it in ...
reviews.review_text: This really works! I was pleasantly surprised by how it made my blackheads disappear. It did irritate the parts of my skin with no blackheads though, so I would suggest using it only on the necessary places. Still, overall, a really great product! Just make sure to rub it in after five minutes, or you won't really get the results.

I love this mask. It is a holygrail. I didn't take a before photo but I know how big and dirty my pores usually are, and let me tell you after this mask there is no black/dirt left in your pores at all! Definitely going to be sharing with all my family and buying again! Great job Milky piggy 🐷❤️
I bought this for a friend and she told me this product works great with her skin. Her skin started clearing up since she got this.

I've got really sensitive skin but this is the best dang product i have ever used! First it's mud then it's bubbles ( must apply fast because bubbles start working fast) then add Watter and it's like a cream! Leaves my face soft and glowing. Gets rid of black heads and is fun too!
Left skin feeling refreshed. But my word this stuff smelled like aftershave!! Yuk. Not enjoyable. Why anyone wants a fragrance in a skin care product is beyond me.
It's fun to do with a friend! Really does it's job, not harsh on sensitive skin. It does tickle A LOT once it starts expanding and bubbling up!

reviews.review_header: I love this! It makes my face so soft and ...
reviews.review_text: I love this! It makes my face so soft and has already helped with acne after a week of using it. Plus it's a lot of fun to use! I read a lot of reviews saying it's messy to take off. I haven't had a problem with it. After about ten minutes I wet my hands and rub in all of the foam and then just rinse it all off with some water. Definitely recommend.
Loved this mask. It was not harsh on my skin but got the job done! My nose is clear and I have to admit, it is wicked fun.

Perfect!! Applies smoothly and bubbles accordingly! Has a slight sunburned/burning sensation if kept on too long and when washing off. No instructions are included with product, but it’s pretty self explanatory. Would recommend!

reviews.review_header: This stuff works. Clears pores out. The tingling ...
reviews.review_text: This stuff works. Clears pores out . The tingling is uncomfortable for about 3 minutes but it does the job!!
I don't notice a difference afterwards but it's cool to have on.
Love this stuff!! I use it 3-4 times a week and it has made my skin so smooth and has cleared my skin drastically! I can't say enough how fantastic this stuff is!!!!!!

reviews.review_header: Helps with skin issues. I'm a believer!
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this mask! Not only is it fun but it actually works at clearing and softening my skin! I have terrible skin and have tried everything there is out there in products! I've found that using this every other day and using sixth city activated charcoal soap has literally made my face flawless! If you've never tried this, do yourself a favor! Also try sixth city soap! They're a small etsy shop and their soaps are amazing!!
Fun to use! Works great on acne! Makes your face feel good and clean. Love the bubbly part

Ive been on that Korean beauty kick for a while now and this face mask is one of my newest favorites. I love this product. Super cute packaging and came right on time. It left my skin feeling soft and moisturized and was super fun to put on and laugh at. Did this with my boyfriend and there was still so much product left in the jar. I will definitely buy this again(:

reviews.review_header: It was ok, but face broke out.
reviews.review_text: It was a fun little mask. But broke out my face. Don't think I'm going to use it again.
Very fun product to use. Absolutely love it. Was shipped fast. Will buy again.
I love it... except mine came with the label printed in a foreign language so we had to look up the instructions online.

reviews.review_header: I like this stuff because its different and fun but I ...
reviews.review_text: I like this stuff because its different and fun but I dont really notice any change when I use it and its a pain to clean off.
I love this stuff! Not only it is fun to use, but it also leaves my skin soft and clean.

reviews.review_header: Milky Piggy Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff! I got it for Christmas and I just now got around to trying it. My boyfriend tried it before me and he was wanting to do another!! My face feels SO soft and clean, also it looks really shiny. I applied it all over, and then when it started to foam, I got the plastic applicator and rubbed in the foam. It takes about 5 minutes for the whole thing! I'm amazed and very excited to order more in the future! It is a little messy, but as long as you have a hand towel you should be fine.

reviews.review_header: I've heard so much good stuff about this clay mask and decided to give ...
reviews.review_text: I never review any product but this is an exception. I've heard so much good stuff about this clay mask and decided to give it a try. Waited so long for it to arrive and it wasn't even the right item. I got a freaking digital alarm clock, good job

I have very sensitive skin, but I thought this product would be good and help my skin feel better and be less dry. While the mask was on it did bubble, but it also burned in some areas. I removed the mask and my face was pretty ruff, not at all better. The feelingwent away easily with some moisturizer, but it wasn't a good experience.

reviews.review_header: Cleanses the soul as well as the face
reviews.review_text: What the makers don't tell you is that the bubbling on the outside occurs because your internal energy is bubbling with delight over how fresh you are about to feel. I've never used anything that has made my skin feel so clean and freshy fresh. I want to buy this for all of my friends so that they too can bubble internally with marvel.
It smells good, feels good on my face, and is hilarious. The bubbles will tickle your nose but hey it’s part of the experience. My skin looks and feels smooth afterwards.
Such a fun mask. Also really does clean up your pores and your skin.
Came seemingly unopened but there was dried mask around the inside of the lid? But the mask looked unused and it is fun and made my skin feel soft after
Bought from a monthly box company. It fizzes and feel nice but it's done zilch. In fact I have to moisturize more after using.

In LOVE with this mask! Im a total fanatic for skin care products. Read so many positive reviews about this mask, I just had to try it out myself! Absolutely satisfied and is one of my new favorites. I love how it comes with a little spatula to help put it on. Once on it bubbled right away. Easy to take off and my skin felt so smooth and clean after. Everyone needs this in their lives!!

reviews.review_header: Good stuff ,but can turn smelly when it goes bad
reviews.review_text: Stuff works but ua e it fast because my jar went bad and it had a horrendous smelled I almost used the product on my face but the product looked bad and the smell was not right . I will buy this in the near future

This product is just as effective as it is entertaining! It does a great job for blackheads- my nose looks significantly better than beforehand. I wouldn't say it makes your face glow, but it definitely makes it super clean and smooth. The only issue with this product is that it can be a little itchy while on your face (I have more sensitive skin so this may not be the case for others). I break out often and this product did not make me break out at all. The bubbles are actually pretty intense so make sure you don't put too much in your face- a thin layer should do the trick. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_header: I USE once a week and my face feels so ...
reviews.review_text: I USE once a week and my face feels so fresh each time. My face cleaned up very well. I’m
Fun, bubbly mask made my face feel extra smooth! Loved it.

I don't write reviews much, but I will for this mask cause so far it's been great for my acne. Aside from it tingling and tickling my face, it is so light weight, easy to put on and wash off, I recommend it to anyone who has acne issues as an adult.

reviews.review_header: Bought this just for fun but it really does make your face feel good
reviews.review_text: Bought this just for fun but it really does make your face feel good, clean, and tight! I have other masks I chose to buy to actually work but this one beats them! Only problem is it takes a little more work to rinse off but warm water and a towel will do!
Love it ! Makes my skin more softer and clearer.. reasonable price and will definitely buy more
It's ok, nothing special. The first thing I noticed was that the container was pretty small. Also I purchased it at $8.49, it is now over $11. Will certainly not purchase it again.

Wasn't expecting this face mask to do much of anything for my skin. Just thought it looked like fun to do but I am amazed by how clean and even this makes my skin tone feel and look. Will be repurchasing when I run out this is a staple now.

My skin is prone to acne so I had a lot of blackheads before using this mask, but they are all completely gone the day after using it. I use it once or twice a week and it makes my skin so soft. I would be cautious if you have dry skin, it might dry it out more but it was fine for me. It does tickle a little while it's bubbling but other than that I see no downsides with this product!
Love how smooth and soappy this product is! leaves my skin feeling super soft
Not for sensitive skin

reviews.review_header: Mild clay mask for a super cleanse
reviews.review_text: I bought this mask after seeing a video review online about how it was really popular in Korea to young women and men. The mask comes with a small spatula which is convenient as it prevents contamination of the product and can easily scoop out the mask. I use this mask after I shower for about 10-15 minutes and then rub it in for another few minutes if I want a little extra cleansing. The consistency is "slippery" and you only need a little bit of it because it will start to bubble as it oxidizes. If you put too much you will have a face covered in gray foam. One thing I want to note is make sure you only put a small layer under your nose or you will end up breathing it in once it foams up (guilty of this). The scent is not to unpleasant but its no lemons and oranges either, however it didnt bother me too much. Removing the mask at its consistency can be difficult but I use a make up remover towelette to remove most of it, then start to rinse with warm water and it seems to do the trick. Make sure to remove it all around the hairline because you can breakout if product is left over (guilty of this as well). My skin is oily T-zone, sensitive, and acne prone and I found that my face felt really clean and tight afterward although my blackheads on my nose still remain so I can say that its super effective for that purpose. I use an aloe vera moisturizer after prior to going to bed and that works well to moisturize my skin to prevent dryness.
